title: Did a Swedish scientist suggest meat as a solution to climate change?
subtitle: The news sites were seized on the basis of observations made by Magnus Soderlund in September 2019, but questioning the climate (and language barriers) may have caused confusion.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Magnus Soderlund suggested or called for the eating of human flesh as a solution to climate change in remarks made on 3 September 2019.
